divs: Sighting Detailsfirst i thought it was my friend on adjacent rooftop lighting napkins until it started doing figure 8 movements then another came as if to make communication with the first then they stood still and shot back up in to the sky with what was what appeared to be be what a shooting star leaves behind in its trail... little sparkles behind it they were... glowing orange..i know what i saw .
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around November 30th 2004
